snippet: The Chapter 11 filing by NewPage punctuates a painful investment for the private equity firm, which borrowed heavily to acquire the MeadWestvaco paper mills business in 2005 for $2.3 billion.

snippet: Holding court in the East Village, Larry Fagin, 74 years old, second-generation beat, gives creative-writing lessons and edits and produces small magazines and chapbooks from the work of students and friends.
